name: Taxi Parking Super Driver: CSR Cab Car Driving Sim
name_original: Taxi Parking Super Driver: CSR Cab Car Driving Sim
description:
FAMOUS TAXIS AND LIMO FROM AROUND THE WORLD

It is the best parking simulator game on App Store! You have passengers to transport and get to their destinations safely!

Taxi Parking Simulator is an addictive game and full of excitement with a unique driving experience and gorgeous 3d graphics. Parking enthusiasts will be sucked into this addictive game!!! It has realistic controls and great dynamic gameplay.This game is exactly precision driving simulator.

Your goal in this game is to park in the designated locations while avoiding obstacles. There is a time limit to keep you on your toes!

It is a fun game suitable for both children and adults to play!

Drive your Taxi And limo at hight speed go for some crazy parkings , enjoy best realistic driving and parking game.
